OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: This VIP is used to create sub orders for members and groups. Change the field mappings from Quote Member to Service Account in QuoteMemberToServiceAccount component.
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: SubOrders

omniProcessElements.name: CreateSubOrder
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "AccountId" : "%AccountId%", "MasterOrderId" : "%MasterOrderId%", "QuoteGroupId" : "=IF(ISNOTBLANK(%QuoteMember:QuoteGroupId%),%QuoteMember:QuoteGroupId%,%QuoteGroup:QuoteGroupId%)", "QuoteId" : "%QuoteId%", "QuoteLineItems" : "=IF(ISNOTBLANK(%QuoteMember:QuoteLineItems%),LIST(%QuoteMember:QuoteLineItems%),LIST(%QuoteGroup:QuoteLineItems%))", "QuoteMemberId" : "%QuoteMember:Id%", "RecordTypeId" : "%SORecordTypeId%", "ServiceAccountId" : "=IF(ISNOTBLANK(%QuoteMember:ServiceAccountId%),%QuoteMember:ServiceAccountId%,%SearchOrCreateServiceAccount:recordId%)" }, "additionalOutput" : { "RecordId" : "%CreateSubOrder:OrderId%" }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction2", "remoteClass" : "B2BCmexAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "createOrder", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : true, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: SearchOrCreateServiceAccount
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "AccountId" : "%AccountId%", "FieldMap" : "%QuoteMemberToServiceAccount%", "MemberId" : "%QuoteMember:Id%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "ISNOTBLANK(%QuoteMember%) && ISBLANK(%QuoteMember:ServiceAccountId%)", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction2", "remoteClass" : "B2BCmexAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "checkForExistingServiceAccount", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: UpdateQuantity
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "QuoteGroupId" : "=IF(ISNOTBLANK(%QuoteMember:QuoteGroupId%),%QuoteMember:QuoteGroupId%,%QuoteGroup:QuoteGroupId%)", "SubOrderId" : "%CreateSubOrder:RecordId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "disableChainable" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "ISNOTBLANK(%QuoteMember:QuoteGroupId%) || ISNOTBLANK(%QuoteGroup:QuoteGroupId%)", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "integrationProcedureKey" : "b2bExpress_UpdateQtyPrice", "label" : "IntegrationProcedureAction3", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

OmniIntegrationProcedure.propertySetConfig: { "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "chainableActualTimeLimit" : null, "chainableCpuLimit" : 2000, "chainableDMLRowsLimit" : null, "chainableDMLStatementsLimit" : null, "chainableHeapSizeLimit" : null, "chainableQueriesLimit" : 50, "chainableQueryRowsLimit" : null, "chainableSoslQueriesLimit" : null, "columnsPropertyMap" : [ ], "description" : "", "includeAllActionsInResponse" : false, "labelPlural" : "", "labelSingular" : "", "linkToExternalObject" : "", "mockResponseMap" : { }, "nameColumn" : "", "queueableChainableCpuLimit" : 40000, "queueableChainableHeapSizeLimit" : 6, "queueableChainableQueriesLimit" : 120, "relationshipFieldsMap" : [ ], "rollbackOnError" : false, "trackingCustomData" : { }, "ttlMinutes" : 5 }
